name: Triumph Studios
detail:
Triumph Studios is a Dutch video game developer based in Delft, Netherlands, founded in 1997. The studio is known for their Age of Wonders and Overlord series and has developed several games for the PC, Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.

On June 30, 2017 Paradox Interactive announced that it had acquired Triumph Studios.

works.name: Age of Wonders III / 奇迹时代3
Overlord: Raising Hell / 霸王之地狱重生
